title: Announcing UAFDKOML
content: For those interested in issues involving the Adobe FDK and/or .fea file syntax, **UAFDKOML** ( **U** nofficial **A** dobe **F** ont **D** evelopment **K** it for **O** penType **M** ailing **L** ist) is for you. Signup is here: [http://groups.google.com/group/uafdkoml/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414065352/http:/groups.google.com/group/uafdkoml/). You'll need to request an invitation (done not to exclude people, but to exclude spam), but that's the only hurdle to joining.
author: benkiel

comments.content:
I applied as requested, Ben.

ChrisL

as long as nobody from Adobe is involved - maybe a bit fruitless

-- [astype.de](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414065352/http:/www.astype.de/)--
